General.Name: Néocom Multimédia SA
General.Description: Néocom Multimédia SA, a telecom operator, provides telecom marketing solutions. It provides SMS, and voice messages to its customers directly on their mobile answering machines; directly access to a mobile phone's answering machine without ringing; conference in 1 minute without registration and commitment; audio and web content; and turnkey solution, as well as stay reachable without revealing number. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Paris, France.
